RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VENETIAN DREAM never far back, rallied four wide through the far turn to make the lead in upper stretch and edged clear under mild right handed urging. GRAY ROYALITY vied for the early lead three wide, rallied two wide to make the lead on the far turn, set the pace to the top of the stretch and held on for second while two wide. SHELL FIRE close up from the start, loomed boldly four wide nearing the quarter pole then was outfinished. TUSKEGEE CAT pressed the early pace along the inside, shifted three wide entering the stretch then finished evenly. SMASH away alertly, set the pace two wide then along the inside into the far turn and weakened in the stretch. FRANCO trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 4 wide upper stretch, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Tuskegee Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, shifted 3 wide top lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Smash
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide 2nd turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Franco
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Royality
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, led 2nd turn, held place, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, loomed boldly 4 wide 1/4 pole, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 10900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 31. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ITASCA sprinted up the inside to make the lead entering the clubhouse turn, set a pressured pace into the stretch then responded under mild right handed urging full of run to win going away while being ridden out. PERCENTAGE never far back, rallied determinedly along the rail through the stretch and got up for second. MAXIMIZER pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. DUEL FUEL settled outside, rallied three wide through the far turn, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack late and leveled off. ONLYATTHESHOE was no factor. LUCKY ANDY was no threat. BRIAR JUMPER stalked the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Percentage
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally rail, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Maximizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Briar Jumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Duel Fuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside, rallied 3w, 2nd turn, drifted out late, leveled

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Andy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUDDEN SHIFT prompted the pace from three wide through the far turn, assumed command turning for home, dueled with the runner-up down the lane and prevailed at the wire. MY TWO AUNT JOANS stalked the pace from the fence to the far turn, angled four wide at the head of the lane, engaged the winner in mid-stretch, raced close together to the wire and was denied in the final strides in a good effort. WHISKEY ROAN set the pace from the fence under pressure to the head of the lane and weakened in the drive while holding the show. BOSS BEAR unhurried for the first five-eighths of a mile and closed through the lane passing tiring rivals. FISHING FOR FUN pressed the pace from between rivals to the far turn, took a brief lead at the quarter pole and faded in the stretch. UNCLEJACKOMO reserved off the pace down the backside, made an early bid four wide in the turn and flattened out coming home. AT THE BEACH was never a factor. THE RIDER OF THE RUNNER UP CLAIMED FOUL FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE LANE UPON REVIEW THE STEWARDS MADE NO CHANGE.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Roan
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Fishing for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace between, brief lead, faded

ENTRY.NAME: At the Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, angled 4w, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Sudden Shift
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 3w, assumed command, duel late, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, early bid 4 wide, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 30. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered I n Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAT DADDY tracked the leaders to the turn, made a steady advance through the lane when angled out three wide and pulled clear late. KOSCIUSZKO dueled on the lead from two wide to mid-stretch, took command briefly inside the eighth pole and was outkicked in the drive. TWICE AS SMART set a pressured pace from the fence to upper stretch and weakened late in the lane. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER broke outward bumping rival leaving the gate, chased the leaders to the head of the lane and kept on with a mild bid in the stretch. THE EQUINEST raced four wide the entire way and failed to mount a closing rally. NO COMMISSION raced wide the entire way as a non-factor. PER HISA RULING DATED 11/02/2023, PAT DADDY WAS DQ'D DUE TO A WHIP INFRACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Pat Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, steady advance 3w, pulled clear

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bump rival, chased inside, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: No Commission
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced wide no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, weak late

ENTRY.NAME: Kosciuszko
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, led briefly, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Al lowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIONISTIC set a pressured pace from the fence to the head of the lane, quickly opened a clear advantage when called upon in upper stretch and held the clear lead in a decisive run through the lane. LIBERTY BELLE stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide down the lane to be second best in a good try. AUJARA reserved off the pace while racing along the rail, saved all the ground and made a willing bid up the fence as best of the rest. SQUID tracked the pace from four wide to the top of the stretch and failed to gain in the drive. JEN'S BATTLE unhurried early to be at the back of the field while racing wide the entire way and made a mild late bid. QUARANTINA trailed to mid-stretch and showed late interest nearing the wire. MIDNIGHT IN OHIO pressed the pace for a half mile and gave way through the stretch. ANNMARIA failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, saved ground, willingly, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, rallied, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, cleared, decisively

ENTRY.NAME: Annmaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4w, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Jen's Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, raced wide, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight in Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Snow Racing Stables and Boots N Bikinis LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantina
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late interest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS SENSIBLE pressed the pace to midway on the bend, took command nearing the quarter pole, dug-in gamely when challenged in mid-stretch and prevailed in a determined drive. TRICKED OUT reserved off the early pace, split rivals in the turn to commence a rally, angled out four wide in upper stretch and closed willingly only to be denied. SHEWEARSMYRING stalked the pace from the rail through the turn, saved ground cutting the corner and finished well in a good effort. DANCE MY WAY flashed speed to lead the field into the turn and weakened coming home. HOLY SKULL prominently placed three wide within striking distance of the leaders midway on the tun and lacked a closing response. SISTER CODE trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Shewearsmyring
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, rail rally, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Dance My Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Sensible
ENTRY.OWNER: Bourbon Lane Stable Manlius Stable LLC Gardella Jeff Winters Racing Stable and A
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, assumed command, responded, determined

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spruce Lane Farm, Nathan McCauley,Manlius, William Robbins

ENTRY.NAME: Tricked Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, split rivals, rally 4w, gaining, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Skull
ENTRY.COMMENT: prominent early 3 wide, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 30 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC PALACE well placed, split horses two wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch and finished full of run to win going away under a brisk hand ride. CATCHAFALLNSTAR trailed into the far turn, swung wide, circled her field and finished second best. LOTSANDLOTSOFGOLD forwardly place two then three wide, lacked racing room into the far turn, clipped heels past the three furlong marker, lacked racing room at the head of the lane, altered course to the four path then improved position late. FULL TIME STRUTIN pressed the pace two wide into the far turn, made the lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch and weakened late. HIGH FASHION LADY failed to menace. LADY GIULIANA stalked the pace five then three wide, offered a strong bid on the second turn, had speed into the stretch then came up empty. DONNA LIRICA away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the far turn then weakened. MO RISSA close up from the start, loomed boldly four wide on the second turn then faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Donna Lirica
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, split horses 2w, top lane, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Lotsandlotsofgold
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3w, clipped heels at 3, altered 4path, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Rissa
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Full Time Strutin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 5-3wide, loomed boldly far turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: High Fashion Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Catchafallnstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHO DA BOSS broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened at will through the stretch under a hand ride to win as much the best. ROMANIAN PRINCE bore in at the start bumping SGT YORK, settled in a stalking position, had a mild rally two wide into the stretch and finished clear for second. BLUE NOMORE unhurried early, found his best stride late in the four path. SGT YORK was bounced around between rivals at the start, pinched back then passed tiring rivals through the stretch in the five path. GRAY TORMENTOR was no factor. CANNON MAN failed to menace. NOAH MY BABY chased the winner two wide from the four path and stopped in the stretch. ROLLIN MY WAY reared while loading unseating his rider, ran off briefly, settled mid pack and had no response. GOLDSTRIKER bore out at the start bumping SGT RORK and offered little.

ENTRY.NAME: Who Da Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best, hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Raimonde Farms LTD & Steve M. DeMaiolo

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Nomore
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Noah My Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, 4path, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Tormentor
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Goldstriker
ENTRY.OWNER: Donnybrook Stable and Royer Family Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Sgt York
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, squeezed start, passed tiring rivals, 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Romanian Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, mild rally 2 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Cannon Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin My Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared loading, ran off briefly, middle of pack, no bid
